pages.text: And if God takes the people for what they did, He would not leave a living creature on its back, but He postpones them for a limited period. And when their appointed time comes, then indeed God is observant of His servants
indeed you are one of the messengers
(Quran is a) sent down by the powerful and the merciful
so that you warn a people whose fathers were not warned, therefore they are negligent
Certainly the word is justified against most of them, for they would not believe
Indeed We put shackles around their necks, and it is up to the chins, so their heads are raised (and they cannot see ahead of them)
And We put an obstacle in front of them and an obstacle behind them and We covered them, so they do not see
And it is the same to them whether you warn them or do not warn them, they would not believe
You only warn someone who follows the reminder (Quran) and secretly fears the beneficent, so give him good news of forgiveness and a noble reward
Indeed We give life to the dead and We write what they send ahead and they leave behind, and We keep track of everything in a clear logbook
